title: Apple stops signing iOS 15.3, blocking downgrades from iOS 15.3.1
content:
Following the release of iOS 15.3.1 earlier this month, Apple on Thursday stopped signing iOS 15.3 for all iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad models. This means that users can no longer downgrade their devices to iOS 15.3.

more…

The post Apple stops signing iOS 15.3, blocking downgrades from iOS 15.3.1 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Following the release of iOS 15.3.1, Apple stopped signing iOS 15.3 for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad, blocking downgrades.
